Method Summary
 void act()
          This method is called whenever the "Run" button is pressed, it confirms if the Kinect sensor is connected, it creates the food objects falling from the sky, checks the collisions between the objects and increases the level of the game according to the number of the fallen objects.

          This method checks wheter if any kind of food has fallen.

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

Mundo

public Mundo()
The World constructor initializes the instance variables to control the levels, the scores and the timer.

Method Detail

act

public void act()
This method is called whenever the "Run" button is pressed, it confirms if the Kinect sensor is connected, it creates the food objects falling from the sky, checks the collisions between the objects and increases the level of the game according to the number of the fallen objects.

Overrides:
act in class KinectWorld

cayoComida

public void cayoComida()
This method checks wheter if any kind of food has fallen.

public void creaComida(int vel)
This method creates the food falling from the sky.

eliminaComidaM

public int eliminaComidaM()
This method is used to eliminate the junk food being touched by the plates.

Returns:
The value to decrease the score.

eliminaComidaS

public int eliminaComidaS()
This method is used to eliminate the healthy food being touched by the plates.

Returns:
The value to increase the score.

errorNoConectado

public void errorNoConectado()
This method isplays a message if the Kinect is not connected.

getUser

public UserData getUser(int ID)
This method is used to get the users detected by the Kinect.

Overrides:
getUser in class KinectWorld
Returns:
Null if not detecting anyone, a user if detecting someone.
